HelpMessage0001:
Don't hold back attacks, and give
no regard to MP usage.

The code entered to make this disc is temporarily
marked as unusable until you've discarded the

discard the disc that currently uses this
code.

HelpMessage1001:
Check for people you've passed by.
Select a passerby to either play against or 
save them to your Battle Memories.
HelpMessage1002:
You can register up to 30 people here regardless
of the results of your battle with them.
You may challenged these saved opponents as
many times as you like as well. Even if a you lost, a
win later can get you a Network Coin.
In addition, if you win the battle, you can distribute
it along with your data.
HelpMessage1003:
You can set the data to be received by StreetPass
communications. If you want to change your Profile
and Monster data sent, please set it here as well.

Return to the game with
Street Pass communications

opponents party members. However, you will

player. You must have won against them in battle
first, thought, to use this feature.

Forfeit and end the current battle. Selecting this
option is not the same as being wiped out in
a normal battle and you will not lose half your gold.

opponent, we will immediately display the battle
results. Victories and defeats are recorded.
